name: G+ Comment-box Profile-pic Hider
description: Hides the profile picture from all un-expanded comment-boxes under every post. This does not hide the profile picture of comment-boxes once they're expanded, nor anything else.
additional_info: I noted that not everyone has these pictures. But I do, and they're driving me nuts, making me think I've commented on EVERY single post. If you have these, and would prefer not to, try this style. If not, ignore.
